vsParam: Well, a pretty good shop is around the corner...

I'm excited, so excited!
I can't wait to eat delicious food!

Erika! It's been so long.
Are you here to replenish your stock today?

Wistyria... Our friend passed the transfer exam
of the Academy, so we're here to celebrate.

Congrats on you passing the exam.
This is a small gift... for you.

Huh, it's... a pen?
Can I take it!?

Sure. You're a friend of [px] and them, so you're
my friend too.

Study hard with this pen.
Hehehe... ♪

Wow, thank you!
I'll value it so much, Erika!

Hehe... Right, [px].
I need to tell you something...
[px], it's said you're looking for the skill books of alchemy.

The "Alchemy of Water" skill book seems to belong to
Lord of Eruleum.

... How did you know that?
And how did you know we're looking for these skill books?

Hehe ♪ It's a business secret ♪
Anyway, you should pay a visit to that Lord. See you.

You're welcome~♪
Welcome back to "Fever Weaver"~♪

Ahhaha... But she brought us good news.
We'll leave for Eruleum after celebrating for Wistyria...

No, no need to celebrate for me.
Please leave for Eruleum right away.

No, no!
You can't stop when you know your next destination!

And I've got such an exquisite pen...
That's enough for the celebration, heehee.

So, please head for Eruleum right now.
Go realize your dream, [px] Senpai!
I see, we'll be back soon!
But we need to celebrate for you before leaving...

Come on, [px]!
Try to put yourself in Wistyria's shoes!

Yeah, it's a deal...
Take care, Senpai!

Yeah.
Try not to fail our kouhai's trust.
